A bob of mass m is suspended from a fixed point with a massless string (i.e., it is a pendulum). The bob describes a circular and horizontal path of radius R. The circle is at a height h from the ground. Right after the instant shown in the picture the string breaks and the bob lands at a distance d from the position where the string broke. What is the magnitude of the force of tension of the string at that instant?
